Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.core

Interface ControllerListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
Lobby, PreGameController, TurnController, VirtualView
public interface ControllerListener
extends EventListener
Interface implemented by classes of the controller that need to handle the events sent by the client
